Title: Login - Positive
Steps: 1. Send POST /login with orgName, identity, password\n2. Parse response
Expected Result: Status 200 and response includes non-empty token

Title: Login - Incorrect orgName
Steps: 1. Send POST /login with invalid orgName\n2. Parse response

Title: Login - Incorrect password
Steps: 1. Send POST /login with incorrect password\n2. Parse response

Title: Login - Incorrect username
Steps: 1. Send POST /login with incorrect identity\n2. Parse response

Title: Login - Invalid payload field
Steps: 1. Send POST /login with username field and missing identity\n2. Parse response

Title: Album - Create
Steps: 1. Send POST /api/tag_description_manager/create_tag with org_id, name, tag_type=album\n2. Parse response

Title: Album - Get and verify
Steps: 1. Send POST /api/tag_description_manager/get_tags with org_id and tag_id\n2. Parse response
Expected Result: Status 200 and album is present with expected name

Title: Album - Delete
Steps: 1. Send POST /api/tag_description_manager/update_tag with action_type=delete\n2. Parse response

Title: File - Create upload
Steps: 1. Send POST /api/files/create multipart form (project_id, org_id, product, name, file)\n2. Parse response

Title: File - Create description
Steps: 1. Send POST /api/tag_description_manager/create_description with org_id, description, is_ai, files_project\n2. Parse response

Title: File - Create tag
Steps: 1. Send POST /api/tag_description_manager/create_tag with org_id, file_ids, tag_type=regular, name, project_id\n2. Parse response

Title: Collection - Create and add file
Steps: 1. Send POST /api/tag_description_manager/create_tag with tag_type=project and file_ids\n2. Parse response
Expected Result: Status 200 and response includes collection tag_id

Title: File - Update tags (multiple add)
Steps: 1. Send POST /api/tag_description_manager/update_tag with tag_list add actions and files_project\n2. Parse response
Expected Result: Status 200 and results contain success with tag_id

Title: File - Delete tags
Steps: 1. Send POST /api/tag_description_manager/update_tag with tag_list delete actions and files_project\n2. Parse response
Expected Result: Status 200 and message indicates deletion success

Title: File - Update description
Steps: 1. Send POST /api/tag_description_manager/update_files_description with new description\n2. Parse response
Expected Result: Status 200 and response includes org_id, description, is_ai, desc_id

Title: Collection - Delete
Steps: 1. Send POST /api/tag_description_manager/delete_tags with tag_ids and project_actions=true\n2. Parse response
Expected Result: Status 200 and message indicates projects deleted
